This Valentines Day light a candle and turn on this playlist brought to you by The Shorthorn staff members PERIOD

Whether youre spending the day with a significant other or a loving cat this playlist is here to get you into the VDay spirit PERIOD

For more music tune in to our Instagram utashorthorn on Fridays for Fresh Music Fridays and our Spotify account theshorthorn PERIOD
